OOC: Airly, I don't think that Trinity can do too much running, eight 
automatic shots were fired at her head from point black range 
(putting the gun on her head and firing can be avoided though, its 
like saying that you grab someone and punch them), and she had 
no reason to mistrust Virgo. On the other hand, was Virgo really 
that unstable?

--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

Lynxiz hurries to the Chivitron base, wounds dripping, and heads 
for the CR. As she enters the CR room, the sight of Virgo firing on 
Trinity is too much. Her protective instincts kick in with a 
roundhouse. She doesn't think to tell anybody else, she just acts. 
Her claws immediately extend, and she leaps over Trinity at Virgo, 
slashing with her right claw at Virgo's weapon.

-----------------

Lokk was about to help Windlord, but someone else had already 
grabbed him. "Well," he says as he looks about the battle field, 
"Lets help Termitron, he seems to be in need of our assistance."

Axis nods, "Lets go Seekker." He heads towards Termitron. Lokk 
follows him. (If Termitron is still outside, otherwise i'll repost)
